org.jclouds.cloudstack.features
Interface GlobalOfferingAsyncClient

All Superinterfaces:
OfferingAsyncClient
public interface GlobalOfferingAsyncClient
extends OfferingAsyncClient

Provides asynchronous access to cloudstack via their REST API.

Author:
Andrei Savu
